title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Executive Bonuses
content:
Savvy Executives and their trusted Associates are primed for a surge in profits this week as demand skyrockets for Mixed Goods and Special Vehicle Work. There’s serious money to be made by moving fast — sell GTA$300,000 worth of product across all business holdings to complete the Weekly Challenge and land a GTA$100,000 bonus.

This is also the perfect time to level up operations by taking 30% off Executive Offices, Special Cargo Warehouses, and a trio of CEO-tier Buckingham aircraft.
